name: @liquid-labs/intraweb
description: Creates a secure static intraweb server using OAuth2 Proxy, gcloud, and Google authentication.

scripts.start: echo 'WARNING: the local app is not currently set up to connect properly to cloud services and the local service is of limited testing use.' && cd src/appengine && node app.js

author: Zane Rockenbaugh <zane@liquid-labs.com>
